Total Costs of Investigations: There have been 20 independent counsel or special prosecutor investigations initiated under the statutory mechanisms originally enacted as part of the Ethics in Government Act. The investigations were generally kept confidential unless deemed in the public interest or until an indictment was returned. As of September 30, 2005, the total costs of 20 independent counsel investigations amounted to approximately $228,712,589.
